law.history: Repealed again 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 63, effective July 15, 1986. -- Repealed 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 34, effective July 1, 1976; amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 1, effective March 29, 1976. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 363, sec. 9, effective July 17, 1978.

metadata.note: The repeal of this section by 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 34 prevailed over its amendment in 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 1.
